mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ac05 (aab501, aaa101, aac502, aac503, aac504, aac505, aac506, aac507) VALUES (#{dto.tid}, #{dto.uid}, #{dto.phone}, #{dto.count}, #{dto.list}, #{dto.addition}, 0, #{dto.sex}) ;
mapper.select: SELECT aac502 as 'phone', aac503 as 'count', aac504 as 'list', aac505 as 'addition', aac506 as 'status', aac507 as 'sex' FROM ac05 WHERE aaa101=#{uid} AND aab501=#{tid};
SELECT COUNT(aab501) FROM ac05 WHERE aac506=1 AND aab501=#{cid};

SELECT a.aac501 AS 'aid', b.aaa102 AS 'name', a.aac502 AS 'tel',a.aac503 AS 'count', a.aac504 AS 'nlist', a.aac505 AS 'addition', a.aaa101 AS 'uid', a.aac507 AS 'sex', a.aac506 AS 'state' FROM ac05 a, aa01 b WHERE a.aaa101=b.aaa101 AND a.aac506 <> 2 AND a.aab501=#{cid} ORDER BY state ;
